name: にちか
text:
────
『ホーム・スイート・ホーム』……

name: にちか
text:
もう一度……
お願いできますか…………
trans:
Please...
Can we try going through it one more time...?

name: にちか
text:
この部分……合わせられるレベルじゃなかったです
あっちで、練習してきます……
trans:
It seems like... I'm not good enough at this part to
practice it alongside you, yet.
I'll go practice it on my own, over there...

name: 美琴
text:
何か落ちたって言ってたっけ
オーディション
trans:
Didn't she say she had failed something?
An audition, I think?

name: にちか
text:
そ、それでは……
お先に失礼します……
trans:
W-Well...
I'll be heading out, then...

name: 美琴
text: 水飲まないと、また怒られる
trans: If I don't drink some water soon, I'll be scolded again.

name: 美琴
text:
「『そのまま捨てられる容器なので、
体に合わなかったら無理されないでください』」
trans:
"The container can just be thrown out, so if they
aren't to your liking, there's no need to force
yourself to eat them."

name: にちか
text:
……
なんか暑くなりそうですねー、この後……
trans:
...
It sure seems like it's going to get really hot,
later today...

name: にちか
text:
私、やっぱりスーパーでもう１本お水買っていくので
どうぞ先に行っててください……！
trans:
I think I'm going to stop and buy a bottle of water
over at the super market, so please go on ahead 
without me...!

name: にちか
text:
はい！
すぐに追いつきます！
trans:
Yes!
I'll catch back up to you soon!

name: 美琴
trans: I think I might tag along.

name: 美琴
trans: You can buy it there, right?

name: 美琴
text: レモンとか、はちみつみたいなの
trans: That stuff that's like lemon, with honey.

name: 美琴
trans: So, we're going this way, right?

name: にちか
text:
……！
あははっ、そっちは反対ですよー！
trans:
...!
Ahaha, that's the complete opposite direction!

name: にちか
text:
はい、こっちです
行きましょうー！
trans:
Yes,  it's this way.
Let's go!
